Hello,
=C2=A0
Better way to work with Juint is to have IDE like eclipse.It =
allready has Juint in-built in it.So you can download eclipse and when you =
go to 
file-->new--->other---->java ---->it will have Juint option.You can =
create your test cases from there.
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
Thanks,
Mihir
